description: This file defines a Spring Data JPA repository interface for User entities, providing methods for querying users by username, email, and with pagination support.

classes.name: UserRepository
classes.description: Spring Data JPA repository interface for User entity with custom query methods.

methods.name: existsByUsername
methods.description: Checks if a User exists with the given username.

methods.name: existsByEmail
methods.description: Checks if a User exists with the given email.

methods.name: findByUsernameContainingIgnoreCase
methods.description: Searches for Users with usernames containing the given string, case-insensitive, with pagination.
